import { Component } from '@angular/core'; @Component({ selector: 'app-request-filter-modal', templateUrl: './request-filter-modal.component.html', styleUrls: ['./request-filter-modal.component.css'] }) export class RequestFilterModalComponent { activeLink: string = ''; setActiveLink(link: string, event: Event): void { event.preventDefault(); this.activeLink = link; } clearActiveLink(event: Event): void { event.stopPropagation(); this.activeLink = ''; } }
